interships.about: F13 helps companies make better, more informed decisions based on insights from the outside. We believe that business strategy will be increasingly shaped by insights from online data. Organizations will look outside, beyond their internal reporting systems to a world of data that is constantly growing and changing. Our customers use these insights to make timely decisions based on real-time analysis.

interships.about: At its core, CAPS provides assistance in academic and professional areas for anyone who may need it. The doors of CAPS are open to students, faculty, researchers, and anyone who is seeking help. At an individual level, CAPS helps one attain greater proficiency in competencies related to the academic and professional sphere, through a wide array of topics ranging from research to career readiness. It is also an opportunity to develop one's networking skills and understand industry expectations through interaction-based university-wide sessions. At an organizational level, it creates a platform for all the deaneries, that promotes cross-fertilization of ideas and knowledge, leading to optimal utilization of the universityâ€™s resources. At a societal level, CAPS aims to produce holistically developed individuals, equipped with the appropriate skill sets that enable them to make a difference.
